title: Tesla 2024 Annual Shareholder Meeting: shareholders approve Musk pay package
snippet: Investors reapproved Elon Musk’s 2018 compensation package and backed reincorporation in Texas at the June annual meeting.

title: Tesla Q2 2024 vehicle production and deliveries
snippet: Tesla produced ~411k vehicles and delivered ~444k; Energy storage deployments hit a quarterly record at 9.4 GWh.

title: Tesla releases Q2 2024 financial results
snippet: Tesla posted Q2 results and hosted its Q&A webcast, with revenue up year-over-year and continued focus on FSD and energy.

title: Tesla delays robotaxi launch to October, Bloomberg report says
snippet: A reported two-month delay from the planned August unveiling weighed on shares, highlighting execution risk around autonomy timelines.

title: Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s $56B pay package
snippet: The record-setting compensation plan was reapproved by investors amid debate over governance and long-term strategy.

title: Elon Musk confirms Tesla ‘robotaxi’ event delayed due to design change
snippet: Musk said the robotaxi reveal would slip to October from August to accommodate an 'important design change to the front.'

title: Tesla recalls 1.8 million cars because their hoods can open while driving
snippet: A hood-latch detection issue triggered a recall addressed via an over-the-air software update; no related crashes or injuries reported.
